verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: left] [ARG1: the summit] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-MNR: with President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: in a $ 1 million Mercedes limo] . The Mercedes - Benz S600 is bulletproof and loaded with amenities .

North Korean leader Kim Jong Un left the summit in Singapore with President Donald Trump in a $ 1 million Mercedes limo . [ARG1: The Mercedes - Benz S600] [V: is] [ARG2: bulletproof and loaded with amenities] .
